translations.{version} is available. Get more informa: {version} is available. Get more information on how to update.
translations.The update server could not be reached s: The update server could not be reached since %d days to check for new updates.
translations.Please check the Nextcloud and server lo: Please check the Nextcloud and server log files for errors.
translations.Update for %1$s to version %2$s is avail: Update for %1$s to version %2$s is available.
translations.Update for {app} to version %s is availa: Update for {app} to version %s is available.
translations.Displays update notifications for Nextcl: Displays update notifications for Nextcloud and provides the SSO for the updater.
translations.The version you are running is not maint: The version you are running is not maintained anymore. Please make sure to update to a supported version as soon as possible.
translations.The update check is not yet finished. Pl: The update check is not yet finished. Please refresh the page.
Your version is up to date.
translations.A non-default update server is in use to: A non-default update server is in use to be checked for updates:
translations.You can always update to a newer version: You can always update to a newer version, but you can never downgrade to a more stable version.
translations.Note that after a new release it can tak: Note that after a new release it can take some time before it shows up here. We roll out new versions spread out over time to our users and sometimes skip a version when issues are found.
translations.Notify members of the following groups a: Notify members of the following groups about available updates:
translations.Only notification for app updates are av: Only notification for app updates are available.
translations.The selected update channel makes dedica: The selected update channel makes dedicated notifications for the server obsolete.
translations.The selected update channel does not sup: The selected update channel does not support updates of the server.
translations.Please make sure your config.php does no: Please make sure your config.php does not set <samp>appstoreenabled</samp> to false.
translations.Could not connect to the appstore or the: Could not connect to the appstore or the appstore returned no updates at all. Search manually for updates or make sure your server has access to the internet and can connect to the appstore.
translations.<strong>All</strong> apps have an update: All apps have an update for this version available
translations.For enterprise use. Provides always the: For enterprise use. Provides always the latest patch level, but will not update to the next major release immediately. That update happens once Nextcloud GmbH has done additional hardening and testing for large-scale and mission-critical deployments. This channel is only available to customers and provides the Nextcloud Enterprise package.
translations.The most recent stable version. It is su: The most recent stable version. It is suited for regular use and will always update to the latest major version.
translations.A pre-release version only for testing n: A pre-release version only for testing new features, not for production environments.
_<strong>%n</strong> app has no update f: %n app has no update for this version available
%n apps have no update for this version available
translations.You can always update to a newer version: You can always update to a newer version / experimental channel. But you can never downgrade to a more stable channel.
translations.<strong>production</strong> will always: production will always provide the latest patch level, but not update to the next major release immediately. That update usually happens with the second minor release (x.0.2).
translations.<strong>stable</strong> is the most rece: stable is the most recent stable version. It is suited for regular use and will always update to the latest major version.
translations.<strong>beta</strong> is a pre-release v: beta is a pre-release version only for testing new features, not for production environments.
translations.Will always provide the latest patch lev: Will always provide the latest patch level, but not update to the next major release immediately. That update usually happens with the second minor release (x.0.2) and only if the instance is already on the latest minor version.
